argument.description: The number to convert to an absolute value.

returnType: The ABS function returns a numeric value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL ABS function returns the absolute value of a number.
sample:
ABS(-23)
Result: 23

ABS(-23.6)
Result: 23.6

ABS(-23.65)
Result: 23.65

ABS(23.65)
Result: 23.65

ABS(23.65 * -1)
Result: 23.65
